content:
So @WG-unsafe-code-guidelines -- it looks like the t-lang/wg-meta meeting will wind up overlapping with our weekly meeting. Obviously the last few weeks it seems like everyone's been busy. I'm inclined to schedule the wg-meta meeting in that slot, which means I'd be unavailable for meetings here, but we can either reschedule that (which I think isn't necessarily a great time) or I can try to catch up.

In any case, I think we probably ought to talk about "how organized" to get.
AFAICT there has not been much going on, so I don't think its a great loss
Yeah, it's been very hard to make time :( I would really like to see us taking strides towards adding in the justification and other work though.
I think it's ok for us to be "taking it slow" for a bit, too :)
Looking at PRs, I don't think anything there is much to merge or discuss
I think some lang-team members found the proposal for the inline rationale style ok
So I think I'm going to just close that PR, and maybe open an issue documenting how to add inline rationale, if anyone wants to take a slab at it
